item.description:
Are you tired of being cooped up all winter? Do you love being outdoors? Do you like playing sports or learning something new? Do you like meeting new people and building community? What better way to meet interesting new people and fellow Boston Volunteers then to play together (and drink refreshing spirits together) for several weeks, plus playoffs?

 

I love playing soccer and decide to create a soccer team.

I'll organize trainings and create a playbook.

This will be very informal. No experience necessary.

 

I bought the team rate through the BSSC, therefore, you'll save a little money.

 

More details:

1. Seven weeks + playoffs

2. Games will be in greater Boston. Most are in Allston and Waltham (please post of the board if you need a carpool and where your coming from. We'll do 3-4 per car)

3. All games are outdoors in refreshing natural sunlight

4. Team t-shirts are included for you.

5. Shin guards are required

 

How to save money? On PayPal click personal and send $95. If you do not deselect purchase and select personal there will be the Meetup and Paypal fees attached to it. If you don't select personal it's $115. Simply choose personal.

Learn more. Another way to avoid the Meetup/Paypal fees? Simply send me a check (to save money).

 

Note that because both teams have to pay the ref for each game ($45 per team), there's a suggested $5 donation per game. Totally up to you.

 

I need to submit our rosters by April. Therefore, and b/c we need only eleven team members there every day there are a very limited amount of spots.

Games will start on May 6th.

 

Frequently we'll spent a little time afterwards and sip some ice-cold refreshing spirits.

This is a joint popular team w/ the Boston Volunteers. There are only a few spots left.

Learn more or discover who else is coming: Your Soccer team

 

Don't miss this fun, seven+ week, community building adventure! :)
Josh

 

The Boston Volunteers
Big Enough to Deliver, Small Enough to Care
Learn more: www.BostonVolunteer.org
item.name: Meetup Soccer team. Community and adventure.
